messages.<color=\"#ffd479\">/clan help</color> -: <color="#ffd479">/clan help</color> - Learn how to create or join a clan
messages.<color=#ffd479>/c Message...</color> - S: <color=#ffd479>/c Message...</color> - Sends a message to all online clan members
messages.<color=#ffd479>/clan create \"TAG\" \"De: <color=#ffd479>/clan create "TAG" "Description"</color> - Creates a new clan you own
messages.<color=#ffd479>/clan demote \"Name\"</co: <color=#ffd479>/clan demote "Name"</color> - Demotes a moderator to member
messages.<color=#ffd479>/clan disband forever</co: <color=#ffd479>/clan disband forever</color> - Disbands your clan (no undo)
messages.<color=#ffd479>/clan invite \"Player nam: <color=#ffd479>/clan invite "Player name"</color> - Invites a player to your clan
messages.<color=#ffd479>/clan join \"TAG\"</color: <color=#ffd479>/clan join "TAG"</color> - Joins a clan you have been invited to
messages.<color=#ffd479>/clan kick \"Player name\: <color=#ffd479>/clan kick "Player name"</color> - Kicks a member from your clan
messages.<color=#ffd479>/clan promote \"Name\"</c: <color=#ffd479>/clan promote "Name"</color> - Promotes a member to moderator
messages.<color=#ffd479>/clan</color> - Displays: <color=#ffd479>/clan</color> - Displays relevant information about your current clan
messages.Clan tags must be 2 to 6 characters long: Clan tags must be 2 to 6 characters long and may contain standard letters and numbers only
messages.No such player or player name not unique: No such player or player name not unique:
messages.Please provide a short description of yo: Merci de donner un courte description de votre clan.
Il existe deja un clan avec ce Tag.
messages.There is no clan with that tag:: Il n'y a pas de clan avec le Tag :
messages.This clan has already reached the maximu: This clan has already reached the maximum number of members.
This clan has already reached the maximum number of moderators.
messages.This player has already been invited to: This player has already been invited to your clan:
messages.This player is already a member of your: This player is already a member of your clan:
messages.This player is already a moderator of yo: This player is already a moderator of your clan:
messages.This player is an owner or moderator and: This player is an owner or moderator and cannot be kicked:
messages.This player is not a member of your clan: This player is not a member of your clan:
messages.This player is not a moderator of your c: This player is not a moderator of your clan:
messages.To invite new members, type: <color=\"#f: To invite new members, type: <color="#ffd479">/clan invite "Player name"</color>
messages.To learn more about clans, type: <color=: To learn more about clans, type: <color="#ffd479">/clan help</color>
messages.You are currently not a member of a clan: Vous n'etes pas membre d'un clan.
messages.You are now the owner of your new clan:: Vous etes le fondateur de votre nouveaux clan
messages.You have been invited to join the clan:: Vous etes inviter a rejoindre le clan :
Vous venez de quitter votre clan.
messages.You have not been invited to join this c: Vous n'avez pas recu d'invitation pour ce clan.
messages.You need to be a moderator of your clan: You need to be a moderator of your clan to use this command.
messages.You need to be a server owner to delete: You need to be a server owner to delete clans.
messages.You need to be the owner of your clan to: You need to be the owner of your clan to use this command.
messages.Your clan has been deleted by the server: Your clan has been deleted by the server owner.
messages.Your current clan has been disbanded for: Your current clan has been disbanded forever.
